doc.title: #73, Shanthi Nivasa
doc.plot: #73, Shanthi Nivasa - the littlest things in life that give peace and happiness in a home. Although #73, Shanthi Nivasa seems to have everything on the surface, it lacks the depth of peace. Amidst the constant family fights, Raghu enters the household as the new cook and brings the ingredient of peace with him. And mysteriously, he leaves. What will #73, Shanthi Nivasa do without Raghu? Will they be able to hold their family together without this unassuming cook's presence?
